summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Section 23.47.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code and amending multiple plats of the City's Official Land Use Map in response to the order of the Central Pager Sound Growth Management Hearings Board in the case concerning the City of Seattle's adoption of Ordinance Numbers 117430 and 117434, development regulations that implement the City's Comprehensive Plan;
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
